summary: Jim Wormold, who is a vacuum cleaner salesman, participates as an Agent in the British Secret Service. But he soon realizes that his plans by lying are going to get him into trouble.

keywords: british secret service|cuba|vacuum cleaner salesman|vacuum cleaner|drunkenness
title: Nuestro hombre en La Habana
